short_summary: Audio-visual services request request for information
description: To provide A/V services to CMHC to participate in in-person and virtual events.
tags: Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA),
full_summary:
"# Audio-Visual Services Request for Information"
## Overview
### Background
Canada Mortgage and Housing Corporation (CMHC) invites bidders to respond to this Request for Information (RFI) to provide audio-visual services. The services will cater to in-person and virtual events for CMHC.

### Purpose
The purpose of this RFI is to gather information and gather ideas from the industry on how best to provide services through innovative solutions as outlined in **Section 5**.

### Methodology
Our intention is to leverage the expertise of the industry to aid in the development of requirements that may precede a potential subsequent public procurement process.

## Special Requirements and Considerations

* `Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding`
* `Procurement Category: SRV`
* `Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)`, and `Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)`

## Target Audience

* *Canada*
* *Canada* (region of delivery)

## Evaluation Criteria

* Please note: no evaluation criteria are attached to this document.

## Contact Information

* David LaBerge, dlaberge@cmhc-schl.gc.ca, (613) 748-4794

## Additional Resources and Materials

You can access relevant documentation at <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4664/rfi002032---audio-visual-services_0.pdf> and <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4664/rfi002032---audio-visual-services_fr.pdf>.



The tender closing date is **2023-04-28T14:00:00**, and please note that the Contracting Entity will review the responses within the following stipulated timeframe: to be determined.

### Contact Email Address: dlaberge@cmhc-schl.gc.ca**
### Contact Phone Number:  (613) 748-4794**
